Translations.Text: save those who believe, perform righteous deeds, exhort one another to truth, and exhort one another to patience
who amasses wealth and tallies it
supposing that his wealth makes him immortal
Nay! He shall surely be cast into the crushing Fire
And what shall apprise thee of the crushing Fire
Truly it is enclosed upon them
Hast thou not seen how thy Lord dealt with the masters of the elephant
Did He not make their scheming go astray
and send against them birds in swarms
pelting them with stones of baked clay
such that He made them like devoured husks
